div.div: I quit Instagram today. Not only that, I nuked my account. It’s gone; deleted. Can’t get it back. No more.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5sOTO&via=Digg&text=Why I Quit Instagram

div.div: Have you ever wondered how an automatic transmission works? Well, today's your lucky day.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XEwBav&via=Digg&text=How An Automatic Transmission Works

div.a: Watch Takeru Kobayashi Eat Hot Dogs In Slow Motion

div.div: You must have seen competitive eating champion Takeru Kobayashi wolf down hot dog after hot dog after hot dog at inhuman speeds, in superhuman volumes, right? But have you seen it… in slow motion?!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tvd7oR&via=Digg&text=Watch Takeru Kobayashi Eat Hot Dogs In Slow Motion

div.div: ALL YOUR PHOTO ARE BELONG TO INSTAGRAM

Look, you really shouldn't be freaking out about this Instagram policy change. So they might sell your photos. Big deal. Your pictures are probably crappy anyway. I know mine are. But in the event you're worried, here are some alternatives.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12nBD0n&via=Digg&text=The Six Best Instagram Alternatives

div.div: I guess artisanal chamberpots in Park Slope were inevitable. thehairpin.com/2012/12/chamber...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5hLtR&via=Digg&text=Chamberpots Are Making A Comeback

div.div: In response to user backlash, Instagram has issued a statement addressing concerns around the company's updated terms of service.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U79Nld&via=Digg&text=Instagram Responds To User Backlash

div.a: Report: No Clear Link Between Cancer And 9/11 Debris

div.div: Six months after the federal government added cancer to the list of sicknesses covered by the $4.3 billion World Trade Center fund, a New York City health department study has found no clear link between cancer and the dust, debris and fumes released by the burning wreckage of the twin towers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UAlWx8&via=Digg&text=Report: No Clear Link Between Cancer And 9/11 Debris

div.a: No, Let's Talk About Video Game Violence

div.div: Gaming's soul is sick. And gamers hate talking about it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T3dw20&via=Digg&text=No, Let's Talk About Video Game Violence

div.a: Every Second Of This Man's Life Is More Interesting Than Yours

div.div: The impetus behind Brooklyn-based entrepreneur Cesar Kuriyama's "One Second Everyday" project is fairly straightforward: The essence of every person's day can be boiled down to a single memorable second — so why not hold on to that second, every day, for the rest of your life?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ua8Fhz&via=Digg&text=Every Second Of This Man's Life Is More Interesting Than Yours

div.div: APPEAR RIGHT ABOVE THE INSTAGRAMS YOU DON'T OWN

div.a: Autoplay Video Ads Might Be Coming To Your Facebook Newsfeed

div.div: Get ready for video ads in your news feed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tvh398&via=Digg&text=Autoplay Video Ads Might Be Coming To Your Facebook Newsfeed

div.div: The AR-15 is a military weapon in the hands of civilians, so exquisitely designed that it might as well have been invented in Cupertino by Apple. It’s the iPhone 5 of guns, only instead of an app ecosystem, it has an ecosystem of parts and ammunition designed to make it as effective as possible.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U6WZeL&via=Digg&text=How Guns Became Gadgets

div.a: Sliding Captchas Might Save You From Being Driven Mad

div.div: A startup says its sliding, image-based Captcha is simpler to use and a potential money maker.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UELgS4&via=Digg&text=Sliding Captchas Might Save You From Being Driven Mad

div.div: You may have read "A Song of Ice and Fire" and enjoyed its HBO adaptation, but now Brewery Ommengang is hoping you'll give "Game of Thrones" ale a try.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5R89s&via=Digg&text=Coming Soon: 'Game Of Thrones' Beers

div.div: FROM APPLE MAPS TO EPIC HACKS
2012 saw the launch of a hundred dazzling new products and services ... and more than a few stinky duds.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yg23kr&via=Digg&text=The Year's Top Tech Fails

div.a: You Haven't Even Heard Of The Deadliest School Massacre In American History

div.div: The recent shootings in Newtown, Conn., have led many people to characterize school violence as a modern affliction, a byproduct of our national obsession with guns and media violence. But the deadliest school-related massacre in American history happened in 1927, at an elementary school in Bath, Michigan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UaKBeu&via=Digg&text=You Haven't Even Heard Of The Deadliest School Massacre In American History

div.a: An A-To-Z Guide To 2012's Worst Words

div.div: You may hate any and all of those words and others; that is your prerogative. But agree with me on this: There is no better way for a semantic-minded person to remember the year than with a list of the words we used and saw and heard, those words we'd just as soon never write or see or hear spoken again.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UIdDP7&via=Digg&text=An A-To-Z Guide To 2012's Worst Words

div.a: 10 Nonviolent Ways To Thwart A Westboro Baptist Church Protest

div.div: Here are 10 nonviolent counterprotest techniques — used previously or newly planned — that we may see in action if Westboro shows up in Newtown.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wi8rnb&via=Digg&text=10 Nonviolent Ways To Thwart A Westboro Baptist Church Protest

div.a: This Letter A Sandy Hook Student Wrote To His Best Friend Will Break Your Heart

div.div: USA Today reporter Yamiche Alcindor tweeted out the above picture of a letter written to the deceased Jack Pinto by his best friend John.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFUnDb&via=Digg&text=This Letter A Sandy Hook Student Wrote To His Best Friend Will Break Your Heart

div.a: The Best Photographic Magazine Covers Of 2012

div.div: The best photographs don’t always make the best covers. It takes a smart concept, a meticulously executed image, smoothly integrated typography and the combination of all those factors to create an immediate and lasting impact.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TuktsX&via=Digg&text=The Best Photographic Magazine Covers Of 2012

div.a: Possibly Suicidal Pigeon Refuses To Leave Field During Football Game

div.div: We don't know really know what the hell is going on with this pigeon, which crashed Sunday's Chiefs-Raiders game by landing right in the middle of the action and absolutely refusing to give a sh*t about the 22 large men that were stomping around it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5SW2g&via=Digg&text=Possibly Suicidal Pigeon Refuses To Leave Field During Football Game

div.a: A Hand-Drawn Portrait Using 2.1 Million Ink Dots To Aid Amnesiac

div.div: After catching a screening of Finding Benjaman at the Tribeca Film Festival artist Miguel Endara (previously) was inspired to help in any way he could, which meant making art.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TQMHN4&via=Digg&text=A Hand-Drawn Portrait Using 2.1 Million Ink Dots To Aid Amnesiac

div.a: Sixth Grader Brings Gun To School, Claims Parents Encouraged Him After Sandy Hook Shooting

div.div: A Utah sixth grader who told classmates he was encouraged by his parents to bring a gun to school after the Connecticut school shooting, was apprehended by teachers after he was found with an unloaded .22-caliber handgun.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12n59U1&via=Digg&text=Sixth Grader Brings Gun To School, Claims Parents Encouraged Him After Sandy Hook Shooting

div.a: Swedish Teens Riot Over Instagram Sex Rumors

div.div: Swedish high school students, outraged over sexual rumors circulating on Instagram, barricaded a school in protest and turned violent when police intervened.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WlFDu9&via=Digg&text=Swedish Teens Riot Over Instagram Sex Rumors

div.a: Egypt's Last Great Pharaoh Was Assassinated In A Royal Coup

div.div: Ramesses III, Egypt's last great pharaoh, had his throat slashed in a royal coup led by his son and one of his wives, according to new forensic analysis.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V3cwsp&via=Digg&text=Egypt's Last Great Pharaoh Was Assassinated In A Royal Coup

div.a: How To Light A Cigarette With A Hammer

div.div: For when you don't have a lighter but just so happen to have a hammer in your back pocket. Which, of course, is always.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WhqwSp&via=Digg&text=How To Light A Cigarette With A Hammer

div.div: "The following menu for a 1902 Christmas dinner party stands—as far as I know—as one of the most unusual ever printed. And also one of the least appetizing."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/lM08X9&via=Digg&text=A History Of Food Poisoning

div.div: Whatever you do, don't touch the glitch.

div.div: Or maybe taking off? Spotted at Creech Air Force Base in Nevada by James Bridle, the man behind Dronestagram.

div.a: Why You Should Want To Pay For Software, Instagram Edition

div.div: If you want to stop social networking services from exploiting your likeness for advertising, you've got to start paying up.

div.a: Would Following A Star To Get To Bethlehem Actually Work?

div.div: If the wise men leave Jerusalem and walk toward the star Sirius, day and night, even when it’s below the horizon, this is the path they follow over the surface.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TXe4oK&via=Digg&text=Would Following A Star To Get To Bethlehem Actually Work?

div.div: YOU WORK IN A BOX BY COMPARISON

div.a: Is This The Job With The Best Views Of The World?

div.div: What is the job with the best views in the world? I thought an astronaut in the ISS. But perhaps I'm mistaken.
